protocol_name: High-fidelity detection of IFN-γ secreting CD4 and CD8 cells in response to soluble or Ad5 transduced influenza antigens using ELISPOT and cell sorting
protocol_name_html: High-fidelity detection of IFN-γ secreting CD4 and CD8 cells in response to soluble or Ad5 transduced influenza antigens using ELISPOT and cell sorting
description:
ELISPOT allows detection of single IFN-γ-secreting cell, but the use of unseparated spleen cells removes the advantages of the method due to a high back ground of IFN-γ-production and uncertainty of the phenotype of secreting cells (CD4, CD8 or NK).

We used high purity sorted CD4 and CD8 cells.

For in vitro restimulation of CD8 T-cells, we used dendritic cells that present antigenic epitopes  of  M2,  NP  or  of  adenovirus  in  the  context  of  MHC  class  I.  In  this  instance,  dendritic  cells  were  transduced  with  Ad5-tet-M2,  Ad5-tet-NP  or  Ad5-null, respectively.

For restimulation of CD4 T-cells in vitro, we used dendritic cells that present antigenic M2 or NP epitopes in the context of MHC class II. For this purpose, dendritic cells were additionally activated by lipopolysaccharide E. coli (1 μg/ml) and were loaded with recombinant protein NP or M2e peptide..
protocol_affiliation: NRC Institute of Immunology FMBA of Russia, Moscow, Russia
affiliation: NRC Institute of Immunology FMBA of Russia, Moscow, Russia
manuscript_citation: Tutykhina I, Esmagambetov I, Bagaev A, Pichugin A, Lysenko A, Shcherbinin D, Sedova E, Logunov D, Shmarov M, Ataullakhanov R, Naroditsky B, Gintsburg A (2018) Vaccination potential of B and T epitope-enriched NP and M2 against Influenza A viruses from different clades and hosts. PLoS ONE 13(1): e0191574. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0191574

components.data: Prepare cell suspensions from the spleen of the experimental mouse according to protocol [1]. In brief, add 6 ml PBS-cell buffer in 60 mm Petri dish, put spleen from 1 mouse into the dish. Crush spleen by back side of 5 ml syringe plunge. Carefully break up cell aggregates by intensive pipetting.
components.name: Description

In brief, add 6 ml PBS-cell buffer in 60 mm Petri dish, put spleen from 1 mouse into the dish. Crush spleen by back side of 5 ml syringe plunge. Carefully break up cell aggregates by intensive pipetting.

components.data: Carefully move cell layer to new 15 ml tube, add PBS-cell buffer  up to 15 ml, centrifuge 10 min at 300 g and 4oC discard supernatant, resuspend pellet in 1 ml PBS-cyto buffer and break up cell aggregates by pipetting.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Carefully move cell layer to new 15 ml tube, add PBS-cell buffer  up to 15 ml, centrifuge 10 min at 300 g and 4oC discard supernatant, resuspend pellet in 1 ml PBS-cyto buffer and break up cell aggregates by pipetting.

components.data: Count cell concentration and viability: put 10 ul of cell suspension in 1,2 ml titer tube and add 200 ul PBS-count buffer. Run sample by AriaII,  stop acquisition by counting 400 beads. Set  lymphocytes gate within  live (DAPI negative) events. Calculate splenocytes concentration from ratio of cell counts to calibration bead counts. Adjust cell concentration to 100 mln/ml  PBS-cell buffer  .
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Count cell concentration and viability: put 10 ul of cell suspension in 1,2 ml titer tube and add 200 ul PBS-count buffer. Run sample by AriaII,  stop acquisition by counting 400 beads. Set  lymphocytes gate within  live (DAPI negative) events. Calculate splenocytes concentration from ratio of cell counts to calibration bead counts. Adjust cell concentration to 100 mln/ml  PBS-cell buffer  .

components.data: Move 0.6 ml of splenocytes suspension to new 15 ml tube, add 2 ul of each antibody: CD19 FITC, CD4 PerCP Cy5.5, CD8a APC vortex, incubate 20 min in the dark at 4oC.10. Add PBS-cell buffer  up to 15 ml, centrifuge 10 min at 300 g and 4oC discard supernatant. Resuspend pellet in 3 ml PBS-cyto buffer and break up cells aggregates by pipetting. Add DAPI 1 ug/ml and pass the cell suspension through 40 um filter into the 4.5 ml tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Move 0.6 ml of splenocytes suspension to new 15 ml tube, add 2 ul of each antibody: CD19 FITC, CD4 PerCP Cy5.5, CD8a APC vortex, incubate 20 min in the dark at 4oC.10. Add PBS-cell buffer  up to 15 ml, centrifuge 10 min at 300 g and 4oC discard supernatant. Resuspend pellet in 3 ml PBS-cyto buffer and break up cells aggregates by pipetting. Add DAPI 1 ug/ml and pass the cell suspension through 40 um filter into the 4.5 ml tube.

components.data: Add 1 ml of FBS to two 15 ml tubes and install them  in 2-way sorting holder of  FACSAriaII. Vortex  stained cell suspension and run acquisition.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1 ml of FBS to two 15 ml tubes and install them  in 2-way sorting holder of  FACSAriaII. Vortex  stained cell suspension and run acquisition.

components.data:
Acquire sample by FACSAriaII. Set gates: exclude doublets by FCS-H vs. FSC-A dot blot, exclude dead cell by DAPI fluorescence, set lymphocytes size by FSC vs. SSC dot blot. Set CD4 as CD19 and CD8 negative events, set CD8 as CD19 and CD4 negative events. Set up sorting layout, set up sorting precision to "purity".

turn on 'sweet spot' mode and start sorting. Example of sorting [2]
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Acquire sample by FACSAriaII. Set gates: exclude doublets by FCS-H vs. FSC-A dot blot, exclude dead cell by DAPI fluorescence, set lymphocytes size by FSC vs. SSC dot blot. Set CD4 as CD19 and CD8 negative events, set CD8 as CD19 and CD4 negative events. Set up sorting layout, set up sorting precision to "purity".

turn on 'sweet spot' mode and start sorting. Example of sorting [2]

components.data: Stop sorting at desired cells counts, add PBS-cyto buffer up to 15 ml to sorted cells and centrifugate 10 min at 300 g and 4oC. Discard supernatant and resuspend cells pellet in 1 ml DMEM-full and break up cell aggregates by pipetting. Count cell concentration as in the step 8 and adjust CD4 cell concentration to 2 mln/ml and CD8 to 1 mln/ml with DMEM-full.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Stop sorting at desired cells counts, add PBS-cyto buffer up to 15 ml to sorted cells and centrifugate 10 min at 300 g and 4oC. Discard supernatant and resuspend cells pellet in 1 ml DMEM-full and break up cell aggregates by pipetting. Count cell concentration as in the step 8 and adjust CD4 cell concentration to 2 mln/ml and CD8 to 1 mln/ml with DMEM-full.

components.data: Flush the  bone marrow out of the hind leg femurs of two Balb/c mice (Six-week  old  female) with 2 ml of PBS-cell buffer using a 2-ml insulin syringe with a 25G × ½ needle into a sterile 50-ml centrifuge tube.

components.data: Add 20 ml PBS-cyto and pellet cell by centrifugation 10 min at 300 g and 4oC. Discard supernatant and lyse RBC by osmotic shock: add 9 ml sterile deionized water and after 15 sec add 1 ml 10x HBSS and 20 ml PBS-cell buffer. Pellet cell by centrifugation 10 min at 300 g and resuspend in 1 ml PBS-cell buffer, count cell concentrations as described in step 8 and adjust cell concentration to 10 × 10 6 cells/ml by DMEM-full.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 20 ml PBS-cyto and pellet cell by centrifugation 10 min at 300 g and 4oC. Discard supernatant and lyse RBC by osmotic shock: add 9 ml sterile deionized water and after 15 sec add 1 ml 10x HBSS and 20 ml PBS-cell buffer. Pellet cell by centrifugation 10 min at 300 g and resuspend in 1 ml PBS-cell buffer, count cell concentrations as described in step 8 and adjust cell concentration to 10 × 10 6 cells/ml by DMEM-full.

components.data: Place into 4 Petri dish 9 ml of the culture medium DMEM-full,  add 1ml of cell suspension (10 × 10 6  cells/ml) into each Petri dish to achieve the final cell density of 1 × 10 6  cells/ml. Add rmGM-CSF from rmGM-CSF stocks (4000 ng/ml) into above Petri dishes so that final concentration of rmGM-CSF is 10 ng/ml. Gently swirl the Petri dishes to ensure uniform mixing of contents.  Incubate the cells at 37°C, 5% CO2  and 95% humidity in CO2  incubator for 3 days.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place into 4 Petri dish 9 ml of the culture medium DMEM-full,  add 1ml of cell suspension (10 × 10 6  cells/ml) into each Petri dish to achieve the final cell density of 1 × 10 6  cells/ml. Add rmGM-CSF from rmGM-CSF stocks (4000 ng/ml) into above Petri dishes so that final concentration of rmGM-CSF is 10 ng/ml. Gently swirl the Petri dishes to ensure uniform mixing of contents.  Incubate the cells at 37°C, 5% CO2  and 95% humidity in CO2  incubator for 3 days.

components.data: Next day harvest BMDCs from each Petri dish by collecting non-adherent cells by gentle pipetting them with the culture medium. Place cells in 15 ml centrifuge tubes, add 10 ml PBS-cell buffer and pellet cells by centrifugation at 300g for 10min. Resuspend cells in 0.5 ml DMEM-full, count cell concentration as in step 8 and adjust cell concentration to 0.067 mln/ml with DMEM-full.
components.name: Description

Resuspend cells in 0.5 ml DMEM-full, count cell concentration as in step 8 and adjust cell concentration to 0.067 mln/ml with DMEM-full.

source_data.protocol_name_html: High-fidelity detection of IFN-γ secreting CD4 and CD8 cells in response to soluble or Ad5 transduced influenza antigens using ELISPOT and cell sorting

components.data: ELISPOT procedure (based on [4])
components.name: Section

components.data: Put 150 ul (10000 cells) of each type of DC's in appropriate number of wells (two wells for each experimental sample) of ELISPOT plate. Let cells to fall to the bottom at least for 1 hour before adding lymphocytes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Put 150 ul (10000 cells) of each type of DC's in appropriate number of wells (two wells for each experimental sample) of ELISPOT plate. Let cells to fall to the bottom at least for 1 hour before adding lymphocytes.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 26 of High-fidelity detection of IFN-γ secreting CD4 and CD8 cells in response to soluble or Ad5 transduced influenza antigens using ELISPOT and cell sorting
source_data.protocol_name: High-fidelity detection of IFN-γ secreting CD4 and CD8 cells in response to soluble or Ad5 transduced influenza antigens using ELISPOT and cell sorting
source_data.protocol_name_html: High-fidelity detection of IFN-γ secreting CD4 and CD8 cells in response to soluble or Ad5 transduced influenza antigens using ELISPOT and cell sorting
source_data.annotation: ELISPOT Mouse IFN-γ Kit BD Biosciences, cat.N. 552569
source_data.thread_text: ELISPOT Mouse IFN-γ Kit BD Biosciences, cat.N. 552569
source_data.body: ELISPOT Mouse IFN-γ Kit BD Biosciences, cat.N. 552569
source_data.affiliation: NRC Institute of Immunology FMBA of Russia, Moscow, Russia

components.data: In case of unseparated spleen cells add 50 ul of 10 mln/ml suspension (500000 cells per well).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: In case of unseparated spleen cells add 50 ul of 10 mln/ml suspension (500000 cells per well).

components.data: In case of sorted CD4 (2mln/ml) and CD8 (1 mln/ml) add 50 ul of cells suspensions (100000 and 50000 cells per well, respectively).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: In case of sorted CD4 (2mln/ml) and CD8 (1 mln/ml) add 50 ul of cells suspensions (100000 and 50000 cells per well, respectively).

components.data: Incubate plate at 37ºC in a 5% CO2 humidified atmosphere for  20  hours strictly  in  the  horizontal position  avoiding  shaking.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate plate at 37ºC in a 5% CO2 humidified atmosphere for  20  hours strictly  in  the  horizontal position  avoiding  shaking.

components.data: Aspirate cell suspension. Wash wells 2× with deionized (DI) water. Wash wells 3× with 200 µL/well with Wash Buffer. Discard Wash Buffer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Aspirate cell suspension. Wash wells 2× with deionized (DI) water. Wash wells 3× with 200 µL/well with Wash Buffer. Discard Wash Buffer.

components.data: Add Detection Antibody Solution at 100 µL per well. Replace lid and incubate for 2 hr at room temperature. Discard Detection Antibody solution. Wash wells 3× with 200 µL/well  Wash Buffer
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add Detection Antibody Solution at 100 µL per well. Replace lid and incubate for 2 hr at room temperature. Discard Detection Antibody solution. Wash wells 3× with 200 µL/well  Wash Buffer

components.data: Add Streptavidin-HRP Solution at 100 µL/well. Replace lid; incubate for 1 hr at room temperature. Discard Streptavidin-HRP solution. Wash wells 4× with 200 µL/well Wash Buffer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add Streptavidin-HRP Solution at 100 µL/well. Replace lid; incubate for 1 hr at room temperature. Discard Streptavidin-HRP solution. Wash wells 4× with 200 µL/well Wash Buffer.

components.data: Wash wells 2× with 200 µL/well PBS. Add 100 µL of AEC Substrate Solution to each. Monitor spot development from 5 – 25 minutes. Do not let color overdevelop as this will lead to high background
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash wells 2× with 200 µL/well PBS. Add 100 µL of AEC Substrate Solution to each. Monitor spot development from 5 – 25 minutes. Do not let color overdevelop as this will lead to high background

components.data: Stop substrate reaction by washing wells with DI water. Air-dry plate at room temperature overnight
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Stop substrate reaction by washing wells with DI water. Air-dry plate at room temperature overnight

components.data: Image  each  well  using  a  binocular  microscope  MBS-10  (magnification  x32)  and  digital  camera  (Levenhuk  DCM800  with  1280x960  pixel  resolution). Quantificate the  spots  by using spot counting software package  ImageJ
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Image  each  well  using  a  binocular  microscope  MBS-10  (magnification  x32)  and  digital  camera  (Levenhuk  DCM800  with  1280x960  pixel  resolution). Quantificate the  spots  by using spot counting software package  ImageJ

components.data: Determination of T-cells which synthesize IFN-γ by flow cytometry
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Determination of T-cells which synthesize IFN-γ by flow cytometry

components.data: Adjust the concentration of each type ot DC (transduced by Ad5-tet-M2 or Ad5 tet-NP or Ad5-null) prepared as described in the step 23 up to 0.1 mln/ml by DMEM-full. Place 1 ml of each type ot DC suspension  (100,000 cells) in the appropriate number of wells of 24-well  Nunclon  culture  plate. The number of wells is equal to the number of experimental samples multiplied by the number of replicates (usually two replicates).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Adjust the concentration of each type ot DC (transduced by Ad5-tet-M2 or Ad5 tet-NP or Ad5-null) prepared as described in the step 23 up to 0.1 mln/ml by DMEM-full. Place 1 ml of each type ot DC suspension  (100,000 cells) in the appropriate number of wells of 24-well  Nunclon  culture  plate. The number of wells is equal to the number of experimental samples multiplied by the number of replicates (usually two replicates).

components.data: Adjust the concentration of each type of experimental splenocytes suspension prepared as described in the step 7 up to 50 mln/ml by PBS-cell  buffer. Place  100 μl  each suspension of spleen cells (5 million cells) into all type of DC.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Adjust the concentration of each type of experimental splenocytes suspension prepared as described in the step 7 up to 50 mln/ml by PBS-cell  buffer. Place  100 μl  each suspension of spleen cells (5 million cells) into all type of DC.

components.data: Incubate the plate  for 12 hours in a CO2-incubator, then add  brefeldin-A at a final concentration of 5 μg/ml.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate the plate  for 12 hours in a CO2-incubator, then add  brefeldin-A at a final concentration of 5 μg/ml.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 37 of High-fidelity detection of IFN-γ secreting CD4 and CD8 cells in response to soluble or Ad5 transduced influenza antigens using ELISPOT and cell sorting
source_data.protocol_name: High-fidelity detection of IFN-γ secreting CD4 and CD8 cells in response to soluble or Ad5 transduced influenza antigens using ELISPOT and cell sorting
source_data.protocol_name_html: High-fidelity detection of IFN-γ secreting CD4 and CD8 cells in response to soluble or Ad5 transduced influenza antigens using ELISPOT and cell sorting
source_data.affiliation: NRC Institute of Immunology FMBA of Russia, Moscow, Russia

components.data: After 6 hours of incubation with brefeldin A, add 2 ml of cold PBS-cyto buffer to each wells.   Pippet cells and transfer them into 4.5 mm-test-tubes (BD Biosciences).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: After 6 hours of incubation with brefeldin A, add 2 ml of cold PBS-cyto buffer to each wells.   Pippet cells and transfer them into 4.5 mm-test-tubes (BD Biosciences).

components.data: Then,   pellete cells by centrifugation  (300g/10min/4°C), discarde supernatant, and add to  cells  1 ml of PBS- cyto buffer. Resuspende the cells and transfer  them to a 1.2 ml microtube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Then,   pellete cells by centrifugation  (300g/10min/4°C), discarde supernatant, and add to  cells  1 ml of PBS- cyto buffer. Resuspende the cells and transfer  them to a 1.2 ml microtube.

components.data: Pellete cells by centrifugation  (300g/10min/4°C), discarde supernatant, and add to the cells 50 ul of  the following antibody mixture in the PBS- cyto buffer:
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pellete cells by centrifugation  (300g/10min/4°C), discarde supernatant, and add to the cells 50 ul of  the following antibody mixture in the PBS- cyto buffer:

source_data.annotation:
CD4 PerCP Cy5.5 clone RM4-5 (BD Biosciencess, cat.N 550954) Final dilution 1:200

CD8 Alexa Fluor 700 clone 53-6.7 (Biolegend, cat.N 100730) Final dilution 1:100

CD44 PE-Cy7 clone IM7 (Biolegend, cat.N 103030) Final dilution 1:200

CD62L Alexa Fluor 488 clone MEL-14 (Biolegend, cat.N 104420) Final dilution 1:200

components.data: Incubate the cells for 20 min in the dark at 4°C, add 1 ml of PBS-cyto buffer, pellete cells (300g/10min/4°C) and discarde the supernatant
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate the cells for 20 min in the dark at 4°C, add 1 ml of PBS-cyto buffer, pellete cells (300g/10min/4°C) and discarde the supernatant

components.data:
Vortex the cell pellet   and  add 100  μl  of  FixPerm  solution (Kit BD CytStirreofix/Cytoperm™ 554722)

http://www.bdbiosciences.com/ds/pm/tds/554722.pdf.

Note: Cell aggregation can be avoided by vortexing prior to the addition of the BD Cytofix/Cytoperm™ solution
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Vortex the cell pellet   and  add 100  μl  of  FixPerm  solution (Kit BD CytStirreofix/Cytoperm™ 554722)

http://www.bdbiosciences.com/ds/pm/tds/554722.pdf.

Note: Cell aggregation can be avoided by vortexing prior to the addition of the BD Cytofix/Cytoperm™ solution

components.data: Incubate the tubes for 20 min. at 4°C in the dark. Wash cells twice with 0.5 ml of PermWash  solution (300g/10min/4°C) and resuspende cells  n 50 ul of  PermWash  solution. Divide each tube into two aliquots per 20 ul.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate the tubes for 20 min. at 4°C in the dark. Wash cells twice with 0.5 ml of PermWash  solution (300g/10min/4°C) and resuspende cells  n 50 ul of  PermWash  solution. Divide each tube into two aliquots per 20 ul.

components.data: Add 20 μl of Anti-Mouse IFN-γ PE (BD Biosciencess Pharmingen, cat.N 554412) previously diluted 1:10 in PermWash solution into one aliquot. Add isotype antibody PE Rat IgG1, κ Isotype Control (554685) previously diluted 1:10 in a PermWash solution.into second aliquot.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 20 μl of Anti-Mouse IFN-γ PE (BD Biosciencess Pharmingen, cat.N 554412) previously diluted 1:10 in PermWash solution into one aliquot. Add isotype antibody PE Rat IgG1, κ Isotype Control (554685) previously diluted 1:10 in a PermWash solution.into second aliquot.

components.data:
Vortex the tubes and Incubate them at 4°C for 30 minutes in the dark.

Wash cells twice with 0.5 ml of PermWash  solution (300g/10min/4°C) and resuspend cells pellet in 300 ul of  PBS-cyto buffer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Vortex the tubes and Incubate them at 4°C for 30 minutes in the dark.

Wash cells twice with 0.5 ml of PermWash  solution (300g/10min/4°C) and resuspend cells pellet in 300 ul of  PBS-cyto buffer.

components.data: When analyzing cells with FACSAriaII, acquire at least 1 million events
components.name: Description

source_data.description: When analyzing cells with FACSAriaII, acquire at least 1 million events
